change_log.description: Removed all placeholder/random logic. Integrated 16+ real-time Deep Brain engines.
Added passive enforcement layer to block future mock data contamination.
Enforced strict TypeScript interfaces on all engine outputs.
Switched from static list to dynamic scan using UnifiedIntelligenceFactory.
Connected User Portfolio logic to real-time Price and Risk engines.

trade_architect.after: const tradePlan = await tradeArchitectService.constructPlan(ticker, price, score, volProfile, tier, sector);

data_source.after: const universe = await tickerUniverseService.getUniverse(); // (Currently throttled list for safety)

re_enablement.notes: Features now rely 100% on real-time data flow. Latency may increase due to heavy compute.

regression_rules: 1. No usage of Math.random() for signal generation.
2. No returning empty arrays for critical data (signals, trades).
3. No static lists of tickers in Service Logic (must use TickerUniverse).
4. All new engines must implement the IntelligenceBundle interface.
5. MockGuard must remain active in the middleware stack.
